definition: aggrieved/dejected/(Tw, southern China) to be moved by a kind gesture etc/to feel gratified/to feel warm inside
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: Most women prefer husbands with big hearts.
sentences.chinese: 多半女人喜歡心地善良令人窩心的老公。

sentences.english: Heart-warming Christmas rewards are within reach!
sentences.chinese: 窩心聖誕禮遇，就在眼前。

sentences.english: His little Anne friendship, really good nest heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的小安雅，真的好窩心。

sentences.english: Love You More Than I Can Say!
sentences.chinese: 就是你給我最窩心的說話。

sentences.english: Love is the Woxin meticulous care.
sentences.chinese: 愛是無微不至的窩心呵護。

sentences.english: Have you met a warm-hearted neighbor?
sentences.chinese: 你遇到過讓你覺得窩心的鄰居嗎？

definition: to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
